/.title: Vue.js 2 Material Component Framework
/.description: Vuetify.js is a reusable semantic component framework for Vue.js 2. It aims to provide clean, semantic and reusable components.
/.keywords: vue, vue 2, vue js, vue.js, material design, vue components, material design components, vuetify, vuetify.js

/motion.title: Motion / Transitions
/motion.description: Make an amazing application with smooth built in animations

/style/colors.title: Material color pallete
/style/colors.description: Easily apply any color from the material design pallete.

/style/content.title: Content styles
/style/content.description: Vuetify has custom styling for default html markup

/layout/pre-defined.title: Application layouts
/layout/pre-defined.description: Select from a multitude of official material design layouts.

/layout/grid.title: Layout grid system
/layout/grid.description: Vuetify supports the material design 12 point grid for laying out your application.

/layout/spacing.title: Spacing helpers
/layout/spacing.description: Spacing helper classes allow you to apply margin or padding to any element.

/layout/alignment.title: Alignment helpers
/layout/alignment.description: Alignment helpers assist in modifying your application layout on varying viewport sizes.

/layout/display.title: Display helpers
/layout/display.description: Display helper classes allow you to control when elements should display based upon viewport.

/layout/elevation.title: Elevation helpers
/layout/elevation.description: Elevation helper classes allow you to control relative depth, or distance, between two surfaces along the z-axis.

/vuetify/quick-start.title: Quick Start
/vuetify/quick-start.description: Get started with Vue and Vuetify in no time.
/vuetify/quick-start.keywords: quick start, vuetify templates, server side rendering

/components/alerts.title: Alert Component
/components/alerts.description: The v-alert component is used to convey information to the user. Designed to stand out, the alerts come in four contextual styles, success, info, warning, and error.

/components/breadcrumbs.title: Breadcrumbs Component
/components/breadcrumbs.description: The v-breadcrumbs component is a navigational helper for pages. It can accept a Material Icons icon or characters as a divider.

/components/bottom-navigation.title: Bottom Navigation Component
/components/bottom-navigation.description: Bottom navigation component for Vuetify Framework.

/components/data-tables.title: Data tables Component
/components/data-tables.description: The v-data-table component is used for displaying tabular data. Features include sorting, searching, pagination, inline-editing, header tooltips, and row selection.

/components/dialogs.title: Dialogs Component
/components/dialogs.description: A dialog informs a user about a specific task and may contain critical information.

/components/pagination.title: Pagination Component
/components/pagination.description: The v-pagination component is used to separate long sets of data so that it is easier for a user to consume information.

/components/parallax.title: Parallax Component
/components/parallax.description: The v-parallax component creates a 3d effect that makes an image appear to scroll slower than the window.

/components/sliders.title: Slider Component
/components/sliders.description: The v-slider component is a better visualization of the number input. It is used for gathering numerical user data.
